name: Overseerr
description: Ensures the Overseerr container is running and its API responds.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^overseerr$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start overseerr 2>/dev/null || docker restart overseerr 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 5; if curl -fs --max-time 5 http://localhost:5055/api/v1/status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'OK'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
